title: VEGF-A splicing variant in plasma is a predictive potential biomarker of bevacizumab in advanced non-squamous non-small cell lung cancer.
abstract: Bevacizumab is a monoclonal antibody targeting vascular endothelial growth factor-A (VEGF-A), a key mediator of tumor angiogenesis. Among VEGF-A splice variants, VEGF-A
